title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: On Linux, running build 20011127, when a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items including the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X) move below the label. This behavior is not observed on build 20011116 on Nt2000. The movement of these icons can confuse users.
EB: The close button should stay in its position and not move down when the view is resized smaller.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Open the application on a Linux machine with build 20011127.
2. Open the Navigator view.
3. Resize the view to make it smaller.
4. Observe the close button moving down below the label.
